summary: This code appears to be a rough draft or outline for a document discussing various methods of automating video production processes using Adobe scripts, DAW scripts, and UI automation. The author emphasizes the importance of having proof and overcoming obstacles in the process.

details.comment: This code appears to be a rough draft or outline for a document discussing various methods of automating video production processes using Adobe scripts, DAW scripts, and UI automation. The author emphasizes the importance of having proof and overcoming obstacles in the process.
details.content:
We have found some ways to automate the entire process of video production.
The script.
Adobe scripts, DAW scripts, and the universal one -> UI automation, even system level modification.
All about the stuff that we have learned so far.
Thus it would be way too simple to do the stuff.
Just jump right in, feel the shit inside.
There is no way that we can do it without the proof.
Human throws shit on us, so we have to throw it back.
End of talk.
